DOC.brief_summary: This study aimed to assess the systemic absorption and disposition of tobramycin in patients treated with a tobramycin-laden bone graft substitute (Osteoset® T).
DOC.brief_title: Tobramycin Exposure From Active Calcium Sulfate Bone Graft Substitute
DOC.criteria: Adult (> or =18 years old) patients Treatment with Osteoset® T Intravenous tobramycin
